Replace.Text: [COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_ABILITY_TRIEU_FEATURES_DESCRIPTION]+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for units fighting in Rainforest, Marsh, or Woods tiles. +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement if they begin their turn there. Both these bonuses are doubled if the tile is your territory.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_ABILITY_TRIEU_FRIENDLY_COMBAT_DESCRIPTION]+{1_Amount} Combat Strength from the Drive Out The Aggressors trait
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_ABILITY_TRIEU_UNFRIENDLY_COMBAT_DESCRIPTION]+{1_Amount} Combat Strength from the Drive Out The Aggressors trait

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_BUILDING_GROVE_DESCRIPTION]Grants +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith to adjacent unimproved Charming tiles. Increased to +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food, +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for adjacent unimproved Breathtaking tiles.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_BUILDING_SANCTUARY_DESCRIPTION]Grants +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold to adjacent unimproved Charming tiles. Increased to +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science, +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for adjacent unimproved Breathtaking tiles.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DISTRICT_DISTRICT_CULTURE_MAJOR]+{1_num} [ICON_Culture] Culture from the adjacent {1_Num : plural 1?district; other?districts;}.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DISTRICT_PRESERVE_DESCRIPTION]Grants up to 3 [ICON_Housing] Housing based on Appeal. Culture bombs adjacent neutral tiles, and increases their Appeal by 1.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DISTRICT_THANH_DESCRIPTION]A district unique to Vietnam which replaces the Encampment. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each adjacent district. After Flight is researched receive [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism equal to the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output. This district does not require population, is cheaper to build, cannot be built adjacent to the city center, does not provide [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points, and is not a specialty district.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_GAMEMODE_MONOPOLIES_DESCRIPTION]Control, improve, and expand upon your Luxury resources! The Monopolies and Corporations mode enables you to build profitable Industries around Luxury resources, found Corporations to further their development, and manufacture unique Products to secure your place in capitalist history.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_LOADING_INFO_LEADER_KUBLAI_KHAN_CHINA]Kublai Khan, grandson of Genghis Khan, you will amass an empire to rival his. You know when to bend and when to strike to gain the advantage. Your wit and political prowess will serve you, as will your martial skill in your conquests.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_LOADING_INFO_LEADER_KUBLAI_KHAN_MONGOLIA]Kublai Khan, grandson of Genghis Khan, you will amass an empire to rival his. You know when to bend and when to strike to gain the advantage. Your wit and political prowess will serve you, as will your martial skill in your conquests.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_LOADING_INFO_LEADER_LADY_TRIEU]Bà Triệu, your people will remember you as a goddess. Stand against those who would try to rein in your storm, and raise your sword in defiance. Neither family nor foe will hold you back.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_VIETNAM_DESCRIPTION]All land specialty districts can only be built on Rainforest, Marsh, or Woods. Receive the following yields for every building on these features: +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in Woods, +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science in Rainforest and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in Marsh. Woods can be planted with the Medieval Faires civic.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_KUBLAI_DESCRIPTION]One extra Economic policy slot in any government. Receive a random [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration when establishing a [ICON_TradingPost] Trading Post in another Civilization's city for the first time.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_TRIEU_DESCRIPTION]+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for units fighting in Rainforest, Marsh, or Woods tiles. +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement if they begin their turn there. Both these bonuses are doubled if the tile is your territory.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_UNIT_VIETNAMESE_VOI_CHIEN_DESCRIPTION]Vietnamese unique Medieval era ranged unit that replaces the Crossbowman. These units have additional movement and can move after attacking. They are also stronger when defending, more expensive, and have greater sight.
